scenes.action_text: FADE IN  on the words CZECH AIRLINE.  We are panning across the words on the side of the plane. 	INT. AIRPLANE  	ANGLE DOWN  on a tray table.  Crumpled Czech bills and coins are on it. Hands are counting the money.  The airline hostess announces the arrival at JFK - in CZECH.  A hand reaches into a breast pocket - pulling out t
